question: I have been on this roller coaster for 37w4d  and cant wait to get off of the ride... went to the doctor and she said I have food poisoning (I was throwing up and had diarrhea all night) and if I still feel sick in 2 hours to go in and get treated for dehydration.... Jesus Christ!! What's next?!?!? I just got over a UTI-- like my last pill was this morning... that was my 3rd UTI... plus an ear infection, sinus infection, yeast infection, hogj blood pressure, low blood pressure, dizzy and fainting spells, suffering from allergies, SPD, gestational diabetes, preeclampsia monitoring, have had 2 head colds and the flu, and now I got food poisoning and have to go in for IV fluids. .. what's next?!?!?! I really just want it to all be done!!!
title: Dehydration
